title: Pro Git
author: Scott Chacon and Ben Straub
description: What is Git, how does it work and how do I use it in a productive manner? This book covers every aspect of Git from the ground up. Most insightful to me were the history and Git internals.
recommendetFor: Every developer which is using or planning to use Git. It is not required to completely read through the book - you can just select the parts you're interested in (therefore also recommendet for experienced Git users).
